long_description: Let your little one show off his individuality and style in the Chooze Scout shoes. Featuring a fun all-over print, left and right shoes coordinate without being exactly the same. Cotton uppers and linings are soft and breathable, yet highly durable; dual stretch gores make them easy to slip on. EVA midsoles offer lightweight cushion for all-day comfort; lightweight wood plates provide support and stability. Rubber outsoles provide good traction and protect little feet. All-synthetic construction makes the Chooze Scout shoes vegan friendly.
short_description: Let your little one show off his individuality and style in the Chooze Scout shoes. Featuring a fun all-over print, left and right shoes coordinate without being exactly the same.
